title: What is your favorite Ariana Grande song(s)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Winter Things as well It ain't even cold outside, not where I'm fromFeeling like it's mid-July under the sunMy jacket don't get no love, no hats and no gloves, not even a chance to rainBut my baby's in town and we're gonna do some winter things Ayo, I wanna pretend we're at the North PoleTurning the heat into an ice cold holidayMade just for me and my baby, ooh, oohMy baby's in town and we're gonna do some winter things, hey Take me to the ice-skating rink downtown (no, no, no, downtown)Even though it's one hundred degrees, gotta get outAin't no ice or no chills, no snowmen to build, most of our friends at the beachBut my baby's in town and we're gonna do some winter things

One Last Time. I love love triangles. Lyrics are good. Harmonies are good. Vocals are amazing. I don't deserve itI know I don't deserve itBut stay with me a minuteI'll swear I'll make it worth it Can't you forgive meAt least just temporarilyI know that this is my faultI should have been more careful So one last timeI need to be the one who takes you homeOne more timeI promise after that, I'll let you goBaby I don't care if you got her in your heartAll I really care is you wake up in my armsOne last timeI need to be the one who takes you home

I love all of her songs but my favorites will definitely have to be Honeymoon Avenue, Tattooed Heart, Almost Is Never Enough, Dangerous Woman, Piano, Over and Over Again (even though she was featured on this song) , My Everything, Why Try, Baby I…. and so much more!!! I just love her
“Let Me Love You”  The beat, and the way she sings it. It’s HAUNTING. Fantastic performance from Ariana and some good lines from Lil Wayne as well.
Honeymoon Avenue.  One Last Time.  Better Left Unsaid.  Into You.

Truth is I'm not an Ariana grande fan at all.I really don't like her at all, that's just my personal opinion. However, her version of “Somewhere over the rainbow” is beautiful.
